location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘VILLAGE of JAFAIR – 1933. IN MANAMA ISLAND – BAHREIN’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with additions in crayon on tracing clothDimensions:738 x 772 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Tracing of a map produced in context of building a Naval Base at Juffair showing ground at Jafair [Jufayr] with plots of land marked for reference and names of landowners reported. Calculation of property value provided in the letter dated 9 November 1933 (folios 54-55).
